description: This repository accompanies the draft manuscript titled "Monte Carlo Drift Correction – Quantifying the Drift Uncertainty of Global Climate Models". For further details, see README.md. For the most recent version of the repository, visit https://github.com/grandey/d22a-mcdc/.
